data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Hà Giang, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hà Giang, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Hà Giang, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Hà Giang, Vietnam to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Hà Giang, Vietnam.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Gelao, Green people.
Father, you gave the church of Hà Giang, Vietnam the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Hà Giang, Vietnam humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.section_summary:
the state of Hà Giang, Vietnam has a population of 705,100.

We estimate Hà Giang has 15,251 people who might know Jesus, 56,558 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 633,291 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Hà Giang, Vietnam to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
